item.title: Charlie Woods, Cameron Kuchar commit to Junior Players
item.description: Charlie Woodsand Cameron Kuchar will double the number of sons of past Players Championship winners to compete in the American Junior Golf AssociationJunior Players ChampionshipAug. 28-31 at the Players Stadium Course at TPC Sawgrass.

item.title: Highly-rated SodaStream Terra Bundle: 47% Prime Day savings
item.description: With thesummer heaturging us to stay hydrated, are you finding it tough to choose healthier drink options when the same old taste of water just gets boring? And let's not forget how thecost of sodas, juices, and pre-bottled drinks has skyrocketed over the last few years. Well, then it might be time to grab aSodaStreamand dive into the world of making your own bubbly sparkling waters right at home!

item.title: These 10 supplements are up to 72% off during Prime Day
item.description: I don't gatekeep my health secrets. I'm on a GLP-1 for weight loss, but I also pair it with a substantial list ofsupplements to reduce the side effects of the injections, while maximizing the health benefits. Because my kitchen counter looks like a pharmacy, I'm usually on the lookout for good deals on supplements whenever I'm running low.
